languages.text: "Да что ты, заблудшая душа, можешь знать о ее правосудии? Воистину, Инцендия зрит пороки, и не укрыться никому от ее карающей длани! Если такова будет ее воля, то я предстану перед ее судом и приму свою долю".

"What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."
languages.original_text: "Да что ты, заблудшая душа, можешь знать о ее правосудии? Воистину, Инцендия зрит пороки, и не укрыться никому от ее карающей длани! Если такова будет ее воля, то я предстану перед ее судом и приму свою долю".

traits.locale_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

"What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

languages.text: “像你这个迷失的灵魂，又那里懂她的正义？没人能逃过因森蒂娅的法眼，也没人能躲过她的复仇之手！如果她有这个打算，那我愿意面对她的正义，接受我的命运。”
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: “像你这个迷失的灵魂，又那里懂她的正义？没人能逃过因森蒂娅的法眼，也没人能躲过她的复仇之手！如果她有这个打算，那我愿意面对她的正义，接受我的命运。”

languages.text: 「お前のような迷える魂に彼女の正義の何が分かる？インセンディアはどんな悪も仕留めるし、誰も彼女の復讐の手から隠れることはできない！私は彼女の正義に立ち向かい、彼女が望むのであれば、自分の運命を受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような迷える魂に彼女の正義の何が分かる？インセンディアはどんな悪も仕留めるし、誰も彼女の復讐の手から隠れることはできない！私は彼女の正義に立ち向かい、彼女が望むのであれば、自分の運命を受け入れよう」

languages.text: «¿Qué puede saber de su justicia un alma perdida como usted? ¡Incendia tiene un ojo al que ningún vicio puede escapar y una mano vengadora de la que nadie puede esconderse! Me enfrentaré a su justicia y aceptaré mi suerte si ella quiere».
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué puede saber de su justicia un alma perdida como usted? ¡Incendia tiene un ojo al que ningún vicio puede escapar y una mano vengadora de la que nadie puede esconderse! Me enfrentaré a su justicia y aceptaré mi suerte si ella quiere».

languages.text: "Was weiß eine verlorene Seele wie Ihr schon über Gerechtigkeit? Incendia hat wirklich ein Auge, dem kein Laster entgeht, und niemand kann sich vor ihrer strafenden Hand verbergen! Ich werde mich ihrer Gerechtigkeit stellen und meine Strafe akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: "Was weiß eine verlorene Seele wie Ihr schon über Gerechtigkeit? Incendia hat wirklich ein Auge, dem kein Laster entgeht, und niemand kann sich vor ihrer strafenden Hand verbergen! Ich werde mich ihrer Gerechtigkeit stellen und meine Strafe akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qu'une âme perdue comme la vôtre pourrait savoir de sa justice ? Aucun vice n'échappe à Incendia, de la même manière que nul ne peut échapper à sa main vengeresse ! J'accepterai mon châtiment si telle est sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qu'une âme perdue comme la vôtre pourrait savoir de sa justice ? Aucun vice n'échappe à Incendia, de la même manière que nul ne peut échapper à sa main vengeresse ! J'accepterai mon châtiment si telle est sa volonté. »

languages.text: "Senin gibi kayıp bir ruh, İncendia'nın adaleti hakkında ne bilebilir ki? O gerçekten de hiçbir kötülüğün kaçamayacağı bir göze ve hiç kimsenin saklanamayacağı, adalet dağıtan bir ele sahip! Onunla yüzleşeceğim, o dilediği takdirde de cezam neyse kabul edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "What could a lost soul like you know about her justice? Incendia truly has an eye that no vice can escape, nor can anyone hide from her avenging hand! I will face her justice and accept my lot if she so wills."

traits.locale_text: "Senin gibi kayıp bir ruh, İncendia'nın adaleti hakkında ne bilebilir ki? O gerçekten de hiçbir kötülüğün kaçamayacağı bir göze ve hiç kimsenin saklanamayacağı, adalet dağıtan bir ele sahip! Onunla yüzleşeceğim ve o dilediği takdirde, cezam neyse kabul edeceğim."
